webProjects.title: Vision-Master
webProjects.description: Vision Master is an interactive web app designed to improve eye focus and reduce digital strain through dynamic eye-tracking exercises. It features multiple training levels with moving patterns that help strengthen visual coordination and concentration.

webProjects.title: 3D Interactive Chess Game
webProjects.description: A browser-based 3D chess application featuring realistic piece movement, dynamic lighting, and interactive camera controls for an immersive gameplay experience.

webProjects.title: PyClean: AI-Powered Python Code Beautifier
webProjects.description: A web application that uses the Google Gemini API to automatically refactor and format messy Python code to PEP 8 standards, while showing a live before-and-after comparison and detailed explanations of each change.

webProjects.title: Finance Tracker Web App
webProjects.description: A web-based finance tracker that lets users log income and expenses, visualize spending patterns through charts, and better manage personal budgets in real time.

webProjects.title: Simple Unix Shell in C
webProjects.description: A console-based Unix-style shell written in C, supporting command parsing, execution, built-in commands, and basic piping/redirects.

otherProjects.title: Pistachio Classification
otherProjects.description: Built a machine learning model to classify pistachio varieties based on morphological features, improving quality control automation in agricultural processing.

otherProjects.title: Diabetes Prediction Using Neural Networks
otherProjects.description: Developed a neural network-based predictive model to identify diabetes risk from clinical data, enabling early diagnosis and healthcare decision support.

otherProjects.title: Customer Intent Segmentation
otherProjects.description: Performed customer segmentation using clustering techniques to uncover behavior patterns and support personalized marketing strategies.

otherProjects.title: Network Intrusion Prediction
otherProjects.description: Implemented a machine learning intrusion detection system (IDS) to classify network traffic and identify malicious activities in cybersecurity environments.
